Content: This map shows possible routes¹ between Delaware and Los Angeles, California.
This map shows the expected amount of yearly rainfall in the United States.
This map shows average temperatures in the United States during 2015.

These photographs show two views of Los Angeles, California, in the early 2000s. Los Angeles is located between the San Gabriel Mountains and the Pacific Ocean. It has the second-largest population of cities in the United States.
